text: Area code 435 is a telephone area code in the state of Utah, United States. It was created on September 21, 1997, when it was split from area code 801. It covers most of the state of Utah outside the Wasatch Front, which is the metropolitan area that includes Salt Lake City. Some of the major cities and towns in this area code include St. George, Logan, Cedar City, Moab, and Park City. 435
title: Area code 435
